Message: What...is...this...?
My vision...
my memories...
my mind...
are all becoming consumed.

My vision...
my memories...
my mind...

Something begins to
wipe my slate clean...

No, wait...
Don’t take that memory...
Don’t take her away from me...!

It feels as if...
a long time ago,
there was someone
smiling at me.

That smile was
as bright as sunshine...
and it saved my life.
I loved it with all my heart.

I vowed to myself that
no matter the cost,
I would protect it—

protect the ray of light
that saved me...

Wait...
Don’t leave me...
Don’t take her
away from me...
For...na...

It felt as if something
had scattered to the wind...

Something that seemed
very important to me...
When I finally came to,

the body of a witch
I’d never seen before
was laying motionless
before me.
